website_summaries.verdict: An affordable model with nice features and style at a price that won't break your budget. Choose it if you want a compact sectional at a low price.
pros: A practical model at a value price
Chaise can be positioned right or left
Neutral color and modern appearance complement most decor
cons: Arm rests feel flimsy, and the padding is somewhat hard
It's less spacious than costlier models

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy couch, good price
customer_reviews.text: The couch is okay. It's not really brown like the picture shows. It's more of a light brown/light gray color. I really like that all of the cushions are removable and the cushion covers can zip off for machine washing. The chaise part isn't very long. My feet hang off the end. Overall though, it feels like a pretty sturdy, solid couch.
customer_reviews.author: ash23

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small spaces!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We received our sectional sofa and we "LOVE IT" !!!!!! It's perfect for small spaces..... our small space was the extra bedroom, we converted to a zen/den. Now this room doubles as an extra room, sleeping for one, or a get a "get away room" went from bland to WOW. Comfy, firm, support, classy and the fabric (we have gray linen) looks more upscale than we expected. G O O D F I N D !!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product is poor quality! Broken first time used
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this is the worst purchase i have ever made! At first use my company went to get up and the arm of the sofa collapsed. You could actually hear the a crackling sound under the fabric. I am completely disgusted that this product has even been sold on amazon. There is an unacceptable defect in the frame of this product! Zero stars
customer_reviews.author: Donna Stephen

customer_reviews.title: I wanted chocolate brown and this is at best camel. I do like the couch otherwise
customer_reviews.text: The color is not anywhere near as depicted. I wanted chocolate brown and this is at best camel. I do like the couch otherwise; the chase is move-able, its comfortable, its on the small sized side. You'll definitely want to get some pillows and oblong would be best because the couch is set low.
customer_reviews.author: Niki Capό

customer_reviews.title: Clean, stylish lines
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous because of some of the online reviews. I needed a couch for a tv room that was small but had some style to it. This exceeded my expectation. From delivery to set up it was 20 min. My room makeover was complete within an hour! The fact that you can switch the ottoman to the other side is such a great feature. It will keep the cushion nicer and if we want to use it somewhere else, we aren’t stuck with only one option. Don’t hesitate to buy this couch.
customer_reviews.author: Blondie56

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: Just got our couch yesterday. It is absolutely perfect for the size of our small game room. We needed something small and compact but still comfortable. This couch is awesome for small spaces. Size is definitely the best part of the catch. A negative would be possibly the cheap plastic legs that came with the couch. However, we plan on purchasing wood ones from Lowe's. Comfort we would definitely give it about a 7/8. All you need are some extra throw pillows for the arms. Would definitely buy again for this price - Sidenote the exact same couch is at big lots for $200 more!?!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Not at all sturdy. There should have been another set of feet under the middle section of the sofa. Without those, that section goes down to the floor when someone sits there. It was embarrassing, and the person sitting there was normal size, not heavy. If I could return the set I would, but I'm past the return period. (We had purchased this in advance of my son getting a new apartment. By the time he moved in and this major flaw was evident to us, it was too late.)
customer_reviews.author: AZ bookseller

customer_reviews.title: Great couch for the price! Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this couch! Super easy to assemble and love that the chaise is reversible. We rotate it every few weeks to keep the cushions in top shape. Very stylish and comfortable. Not the greatest couch out there but for a small space or someone just starting out this is a great piece of furniture to obtain. Got free prime shipping and the gentlemen that delivered it were super nice and professional. Helped us get it into our living room exactly where we wanted the box. Came right on time. Would definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Overall great pick
customer_reviews.text: Our living room is huge, so it may not be *as* small as it seems from the picture, but, it is a very nice couch and the long part is able to be put on either side! I will add though, that the couch seems like it wouldn’t be for a family home. Maybe like a couple with one child or something. Also, may not be suitable for very heavy weights.
customer_reviews.author: Dyniesha Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's great for a small space. Absolutely love the color! It is a cheap couch though. Too much pressure on the arms and they feel like they are cracking. I am also constantly having to readjust the cushions. That being said it's a comfy little couch, I've fallen asleep on it many times. As for pet hair, it's a magnet. However, it does hide it pretty well. You have to look closely and it does vacuum off decently.
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Definitely on the small side, but comfy. You won’t be able to use for an afternoon nap, it is shorter than you can fit unless you are shorter than 5’5”. If you lay sideways your body is half way out because there is not much depth. If you sit the seat does not reach your knees. But despite all this I like it. The material is nice. It is great for small spaces and apartments.
customer_reviews.author: stigabre

customer_reviews.title: NOPE
customer_reviews.text: Hunk of JUNK. Had for two weeks, it essentially crumbled. The arm rest immediately separated from the couch and Wood was busted inside the couch. I attempted to return it in the window of returns but the expectation was to dismantle and rebox it the damn thing. Open up the couch and the entire back separated as well so not only is the arm unstable the seat slopes. Wood glue clamps and lots of industrial staples later I’m a sad lady. Can’t even drop wood screws in it to secure it bc it’s all made of plywood and splits. Pretty exspensive couch for something that lasted me two weeks
customer_reviews.author: J. Beyer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed for the price I wanted to pay
customer_reviews.text: Great buy for the price! If you are a larger person I could see how this wouldn't be suitable but I'm 5'9' 175 lbs and have no issues with it. It fits my apartment perfectly although I wish I had gotten it in a different material because my cats like to scratch it up. That actually wasn't much of an issue either since a lighter and a razor blade thereafter made quick of the work that the cats did on it.
customer_reviews.author: americandeagle

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. 4 Stars because it's quite small and slides around on the tile and rug a little when you sit in it. Also the ottoman is not attached. It's a separate piece that the chaise cushion sits on top so it slides out from the main couch and I constantly have to push it in to "fix" it. Nice couch for the price and easily fits into a small space.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Way to Small
customer_reviews.text: SO I dont know what the person was talking about this Sofa is a decent size. This sofa is so small its disrespectful. The color and sturdiness is perfect as I like my sofa firm but I cant get over how small this sofa is. im 5'9 and my entire legs hang off the sectional part...smh... I guess it would be good for a home office or a very small space. but I dont recommend at all for a living room... even if you have a apt re consider.. you'll be blown about the size... Im returning
customer_reviews.author: Henry H.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for small space area
customer_reviews.text: My living room area is very small and I purchased this sectional and I LOVE IT VERY MUCH!!. . . It is a perfect fit to my small living area and the quality and color are perfect. I finally found the perfect size to my living area! I highly recommend it to anyone who is looking to buy something comfortable and beautiful brown mocha color!
customer_reviews.author: Blessed Beyond Imagination

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about buying a couch on line, however it's a Prime purchase so returns are possible. I won't be returning it! Love it! I got the blue one for my family room and it beautiful! Great for a smaller space. Firm cushions and very comfy! It is not a high end sofa, however well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Elmer Zeuner

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 3 season porch and couldn’t be happier! It arrived in a box about the size of a refrigerator that I moved across the house myself and assembled alone with the “help” of a two year old. Sprayed upholstery with scotch guard to repel stains and so far it’s held up great! It is cute, comfy and the ottoman parts stays in place
customer_reviews.author: Robert Branchaud

customer_reviews.title: Very Cheaply Made
customer_reviews.text: I am not a large person, but this thing creaks whenever I sit on it. The fabric is ok but the stuffing is hard. The "chaise" portion is actually a separate piece that goes under a longer cushion, it's not actually attached to the couch in any way. This is something that could be picked up at a Big Lots for about $200. I can already tell that I'm going to need to replace this in the next year or two.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Snyder

customer_reviews.title: The color is nice but overall quality is disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The color is nice but overall quality is disappointing. I've had this couch for less than 6 months and for awhile already I have been dealing with issues where the cushions are flattened and you sink into the couch. With the flattened cushions, it can feel like you are sitting directly on the support bars with little padding. This type of wear has occurred in such a short period of time and that is with me living by myself so its use has been relatively limited. Aside from the wear, the arm rest seem flimsy and start cracking with relatively pressure applied to them. It would also be nice if the couch was a little deeper.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon T.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap wood
customer_reviews.text: This sofa would have be been good if it wasn’t for the cheap wood used, the wood piece in the bottom came broken and to avoid the return hustle I had to fix it myself. It would be easy for you to just keep searching for better product instead. Good luck !
customer_reviews.author: Yassir

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but not fantastic either
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not a high quality piece of furniture, but one would not expect that in this price point. The top pad decent thickness. Color and fabric is as described. The legs, which you must screw on yourself are plastic, not wood. If they wanted to take things up a notch, this would be an easy change.
customer_reviews.author: Aron

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: This couch is perfect for my condo. I am 5' 5" and when sitting on the chaise part, my heel is on the chaise cushion. The back cushions and chaise cushion can be used and flipped over which is great. Unfortunately the other two seat cushions have the colored fabric only on one side so they can't be flipped for wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! It's just the right size for a ...
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! It's just the right size for a small apartment. Sturdy, no real assembly required except for hand screwing on the base legs on underneath the sofa. It's also very comfy and doesn't feel cheap like other sofas in the same price range. I've had many guests stay over and sleep on this sofa and I've had no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: light, firm, and small
customer_reviews.text: this couch is really perfect for a small apartment and I do like them, just wish they were a tad bit wider but then again, these couches don't sink and sturdy and needs to be sat but...still nice. just needs to put something on the bottom so it doesn't slide since it's kinda light couch
customer_reviews.author: Youngster

customer_reviews.title: Not sure
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 4 stars because 1) it's really hard 2) i don't fit well in it 3) i don't know how long it would last. It doesn't look cheap how ever is very nice for a small studio apartment or a small livingroom like mine. The fabric is ok (very soft). I think I'll just spend another $100 next time and buy a much more comfortable sofa from ikea.
customer_reviews.author: allie

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT COUCH
customer_reviews.text: Boy I was so worried purchasing a sofa that I would have to put together from an on-line website, but I am so thrilled that I did - this couch is PERFECT - Sturdy and comfortable and the perfect size for a small living room. And putting it together was so easy!!!!! Extremely Happy!!!
customer_reviews.author: C & O

customer_reviews.title: Awful couch! Deceiving as it can look really nice set up.
customer_reviews.text: I included a picture of the couch set up, looking nice, to show how it can be deceiving. This couch is awful. It is incredibly uncomfortable, and I’m a person who enjoys firm couches. It is made of cheap wood, and yes I’m aware of the price. The entire arm broke so I included a picture of me pushing down on it. I’ve had this couch for 4-5 months only and I’m throwing it away. The zippers on the cushions won’t zip. The fabric after only two weeks starts to stretch and gets baggy. I don’t recommend at all and I want to save someone this headache.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte M

customer_reviews.title: Good for a year or so, or for staging
customer_reviews.text: I've had it about a year. It's pilling terribly, and the arm rests are crushed. The cushions have shrunk and are pulling apart. It's a nice color and cute but it's not coming with me when I love, hoping I can get $50 for it
customer_reviews.author: Boomqueen79

customer_reviews.title: Steal!
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery from XPO. Pretty easy to assemble. Firm, but I like firm couches. Good quality for the price. Good size for a small apartment. You can still get it even with a bigger home, maybe add an accent chair? I got it in the teal, looks even prettier in person!
customer_reviews.author: Noel. J

customer_reviews.title: Spots on couch
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived but had a couple of white spots on it - not sure what it is. Also, got an email that I would get a call from the delivery guys 1/2 hour before they arrived, no call. Just showed up at my apartment door without approval from the front desk (security reasons).
customer_reviews.author: BLOC

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: Really stiff and doesn't seem to be the quality that others said it was in their reviews. Was hoping for something a little more comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Made with slavaged, and rotten wood!! DO NOT BUY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Crap. This couch is absolutely made in a back alley in some Downtown L.A. trash dump. While sitting on the edges of the couch, of you rest your chin in you hand, your elbow will break through the arm of the couch!!! Its like dry rotted wood was used to construct it!!! I feel like Amazon really sropped the ball in offering this item. HORRIBLE and embarrassing to have in your apartment or home....embarrassing even for a SHACK in Tiajuana Mexico!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke the same day it was set up.
customer_reviews.text: Update: inner wood broke the first time it was sat on by my 100lb daughter. I'm returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine DeLude

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my smaller sized living room!!
customer_reviews.text: Rougher fabric but pretty comfy! (I put sheets over the couch.) Easy set up. The delivery guys were super friendly and were easy to communicate with as well. Ps.i live upstairs.
customer_reviews.author: Ina

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and great price.
customer_reviews.text: I love this small sectional couch. Fits perfect in my place & the quality is awesome. I would recommend this couch to everyone & for the price best in town than anywhere else. Easy to assemble & shipping was free.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda

customer_reviews.title: Great for smaller apartments
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my mother. She wanted a lounge and needed something to fit in her apartment. She loves it, and plans on getting a slipper chair to match. Easily put together.
customer_reviews.author: Bettie Rocker

customer_reviews.title: Good couch, but the arms on it are very ...
customer_reviews.text: Good couch, but the arms on it are very weak wood. If you lean on it you will hear it start to snap. Small couch, but good for a tiny apartment, and someone who is looking for easy to move furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Gavin

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for a small space!
customer_reviews.text: This couch is perfect! I'm in a small apartment and it fits the space beautifully. A little firm, but I added some pillows and it's comfy. I'm tall, almost six feet, and I can sit and recline on the chaise very comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: True to picture & sturdy, but the seats are a bit short for ppl w/ long legs - Still Love it though!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous, true to the picture, and very easy to clean. My only (minor) complaint would be that the seat portion is a bit short if you have long legs. But, other than that, it is really a quality piece of furniture for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but cheap
customer_reviews.text: Cute but not well made. I’ve had for 7 months and the stitching is already coming off.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Cute for my Studio
customer_reviews.text: Great couch for the price!! Fits well in my studio apartment. VERY easy to assemble. Its just me, so this is a perfect size, stylish, and I'm satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: melissa miranda

customer_reviews.title: i think it looks great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Looks wise, i think it looks great for the price. Comfort on the other.. i would rate it a 5/10. its def smaller sofa but for apts or studios, i think its a good fit. I can tell the comforter will sink in soon in my usual sitting spot. It's been about a week.. hopefully it'll last
customer_reviews.author: Joe k

customer_reviews.title: Not great quality -didn’t last us 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Looked cute when it first arrived -didn’t last a month. The front panel of wood has cracked and it sags in the middle. The cushions are getting saggy after 1 month of use. So disappointed we had to buy a different couch. I knew spending around $700 a couch wouldn’t last long but I thought my kids or cats would get to it and we would get at least a couple years out of it. We didn’t even make it 2 months....
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful! Just what I was expecting ! Feel along the underside of the ottoman for the Velcro you can then reach in and get the legs. Also do check inside the legs if you have any missing plastic washers some of mine were wedged in there.
customer_reviews.author: Avi

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised at quality for the money.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy and nice looking chaise sofa. For just of $400 you can't go wrong. It looks great in the master bedroom sitting room and is very comfortable. Very pleased with our purchase. The ingenious way of packaging tucks everything into an easily delivered box.
customer_reviews.author: JVE

customer_reviews.title: Great product, shipping was a hassle!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, but shipping and delivery was a hassle! Ive had this couch before in brown and loved it, love the blue one (closer to teal) too! Shipping wise, I had to choose a delivery day and time and be home. I scheduled to be home and they couldn’t delivery it until 5 days later, said they would give me a 2 hour window but gave me a 12 hour window. It was such a hassle since I work during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Sofa with chaise and Ottoman
customer_reviews.text: It was what I expected for m apartment and price. The material nice semi firn but not uncomfortable and easy to put together Shipping was s great and packaged well turns intofull size bed with large ottoman
customer_reviews.author: Tina V.

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: Broke after 1 week. I’m 140 pounds should not be breaking it this early on for just sitting on it. It was so cute comfy and east to assemble. Just a shame that it broke so easily. :(
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Flannery

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality, we’ve had this couch for about 1 yr and we hardly ever use it because it’s so uncomfortable. About 4 months ago the zipper on one of the cushion covers broke and now the foam is showing partially..
customer_reviews.author: CptSmoke

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I got the couch used for $200 And I’m very satisfied. I would not recommend this couch for $450 though personally
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice.
customer_reviews.text: This is very light and very good looking. I just bought the matching additional ottoman. It's very comfortable. I'm buying another for another residence.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Follen

customer_reviews.title: This couch is comfortable, but it would be more comfortable if the ...
customer_reviews.text: This couch is comfortable, but it would be more comfortable if the cushions were deeper and wider. The cushions were a bit stiff at first, but they broke in within a couple weeks of regular use. Still, I'd probably buy my next couch from Costco, somewhere I could try it out before buying.
customer_reviews.author: Sutaru

customer_reviews.title: Shipping is not like what I read from the website
customer_reviews.text: The shipping is right on time, exactly the time slot they provide. Shipping is not like what I read from the website. At least XPS did a good job in my case. The sofa is the right size, good enough for three. Not very long or large. If you are 300 lbs, it's tiny.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Good looking sofa and delivered to my front door!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color, nice form seating, love the versatility of being able to move the chaise to either end.
customer_reviews.author: Debra W. Jones

customer_reviews.title: On a good note, it's the perfect size and hides the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this couch for over a year. When I first got it, it was very uncomfortable but after a year it's finally "sunk" in. The cushion covers do not come off, so I cannot wash them. On a good note, it's the perfect size and hides the dirt well.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: This product is cheaply made. It was a lot smaller than I wanted. I have a small living room in this couch was too small for the room. Only 2 adults can sit on it comfortably. I dont recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This couch is crap.
customer_reviews.text: It would be more comfortable if it hadn't broken just 3 months after buying it. It is not well built and not worth the money. I contacted the seller but they have not responded. Save your money. I am so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Great Sofa
customer_reviews.text: Pretty dang happy. Delivery was fast, they brought it right inside my second story apartment. Set up was so easy! It fits perfect in my tiny apartment living room. It's comfortable and stylish and for the price, it's a steal!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlie Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: You can get better for the price
customer_reviews.text: The chaise cushion measurements are off. Leaves a big gap in the cushions at the back or a big gap in the chaise in the front. Went to sit on it for the first time and heard a big crack in the foundation. Too scared to look and it’s worth too much trouble to return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but cheap
customer_reviews.text: Assembled solo with minimal tools and it fits the space well; the problem is that the frame wood is weak and already broken in three places in the two months I’ve had it. I’m 6’2” and 220; not exactly out of what a standard couch should be able to support.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor cope

customer_reviews.title: No padding on arms, uncomfortable cushions and whole seating ...
customer_reviews.text: No padding on arms, uncomfortable cushions and whole seating area supported by two 1" square plywood sticks. One broke within 3 weeks. You get what you pay for at this price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and firmly comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly suitable for compact spaces. Color is true to photo. With reversal, removal cushions this is entirely a surpringly good small sofa, perfect for my current needs
customer_reviews.author: Jeweled Onyx

customer_reviews.title: Love this couch and that the longer end can be ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this couch and that the longer end can be moved to either side of the couch. My only complaint is the hardness of the arm rests. But that's really more of a personal preference.
customer_reviews.author: C R

customer_reviews.title: Can't Beat it for the price
customer_reviews.text: Small but perfect for a small area. Very well made and comfortable. Color just like the picture. I'm 6' 2"" and can stretch out on it. Cannot beat it for the price
customer_reviews.author: Vincent. G

customer_reviews.title: Easy peasy lemon squeezy!
customer_reviews.text: Speedy delivery! Easy to put together and looks fabulous! I need another.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: I love this couch
customer_reviews.text: I love that the L part is reversible. I live in a suuuper tiny apartment and it fits just right without taking up too much of the only space we have.
customer_reviews.author: taniea allen

customer_reviews.title: Missing a piece
customer_reviews.text: We got the couch and it wasn't at all like the description on amazons website. I was putting it together and one of the legs wouldn't go in come to find out that the screw the leg is supposed to go Into wasn't there it wasn't installed when the couch was put together before shipping. Smaller then the description. Very comfy though wouldn't recommend getting if you can find something bettwr
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Structure
customer_reviews.text: The nails used to hold the product are cheap and break/detach easily. Don't waste your money on the Uniters policy as it will not cover a claim for the damage cause by a person sitting on it and nails detaching causing wood to break.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Hole on the side
customer_reviews.text: This little sectional is perfect for my apartment. The only thing that bothered me most was the hole on the side. It probably happened while shipping. I think they should put foam all around the item to avoid this problem. My husband refused to go through the return process so I just stitched it up. Sadly it was on the side facing out. Another thing that disappointed me was the chaise cannot be connected/vaulted to the actual sofa. You just kind of push it next to the sofa and put the big pillow on it. Hopefully it won't move around because I have two little ones. Overall, the couch is great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Npij

customer_reviews.title: I like the color and it fits nicely in my little ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the color and it fits nicely in my little apartment. I’m disappointed I’m the quality, however. The zipper on the cushion for the chaise is broken, and I just bought the couch a few months ago. The chaise is also pretty lumpy and uncomfortable. I bought it with hopes of getting a year or two out of it, but I regret not going to a store and picking something out. I wouldn’t recommend this couch.
customer_reviews.author: Christen Parker

customer_reviews.title: this ottoman has the completion of the couch that go's ...
customer_reviews.text: this ottoman has the completion of the couch that go's with it had made a day bed out of it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, too stiff and uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Its all right, kinda wish I went with a more comfortable one. The seats are too stiff for my liking and I don’t feel too comfortable but it’s going to be a hassle to return because I threw away the box it came in.
customer_reviews.author: misraim

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable couch
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful couch, excellent price! Also great suponer service, they let us know exactly when was to be delivered. Easy assembly, just what we wanted. Very firm, but that works for us!
customer_reviews.author: Fairies Magic

customer_reviews.title: 9 Months Later and Broken! Awful!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this sofa last August and just 9 months later the wood frame has broke. This should not happen for any sofa! I emailed homelegance multiple times with no reply from them. Tried to call them but the number doesn’t work. Absolute mess. Don’t ever buy this brand !
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I received my sofa today and I am beyond pleased with it, it is sturdy, very comfortable and just beautiful it is the perfect piece for my 'She Room.'
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great modern couch
customer_reviews.text: Very nice couch. Very slick and modern, put it together within 30 mins. Very light. It is stiff, which I like to keep the shape. Had it for 2 days so I can't say whether it's held up. For the price it's awesome, we love it. Small couch for our little family
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice couch for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleasantly surprised by the quality of this sofa for the price. It's comfortable and seems well made so far. We've not used it long so I can't attest to how well it holds up over time, but it looks nice right now.
customer_reviews.author: read.write.coffee

customer_reviews.title: its almost perfect. the only issue we had were the arm ...
customer_reviews.text: its almost perfect. the only issue we had were the arm rest are kinda thin and when you set your elbow or hand on it it makes a scary cracking/ breaking noise
customer_reviews.author: shelby  cash

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Got the couch finally. But it’s missing two cushions and the legs. Instead of sending me the missing pieces they want me to box it back up and return it. It’s a couch! Not some small thing I can just put in a box!!! Highly disappointed would not recommend to anyone at all.
customer_reviews.author: marissa

customer_reviews.title: It is not washable like it states
customer_reviews.text: It is not washable like it states. I had to wash it and taking the cover off of the cushion was a nightmare! Putting it back on was even worse. Zipper broke with n force at all. VERY cheap.
customer_reviews.author: baruch

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up - looks great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up - looks good - is a little Doran but not surprised based on other reviews - for the money - very satisfied with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Meisel

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, smaller than i thought but not bad
customer_reviews.text: Not bad, smaller than i thought but not bad. Assembled in no time after removing box it's stored in. I actually fell asleep on it my 1st night, not bad. Nice choice for small living room area. Now football is back on tv and yes sir i'll be sitting on this. Thanks guys!
customer_reviews.author: william s.

customer_reviews.title: I do hope it lasts & lasts as it's comfortable and a great value for the inexpensive price.
customer_reviews.text: Ok it came in a huge box delivered right to the door and was so easy to assemble. The bottom has a velcro opening across the whole length and width. That's where you find the big cushion & feet. It costs about 2 or 3 times as much in any store. Great Value.
customer_reviews.author: Yor1lady

customer_reviews.title: most uncomfortable price of furniture I've ever owned don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Very uncomfortable seats are really small so not alot of room to relax if I knew how to return i would worst purchase I've made on amazon
customer_reviews.author: Dylon w.

customer_reviews.title: Product was damaged
customer_reviews.text: The product was delivered with a damage. One of the sides is broken.
customer_reviews.author: sups

customer_reviews.title: as it is really making my back hurt and sofa is not at all comfortable..
customer_reviews.text: Don't ever buy this sofa.... as it is really making my back hurt and sofa is not at all comfortable ... it is not even 3 months since we bought the Sofa ... all the cushions are getting flattened... I planned to returned in Dec but my bad i was on vacation and couldn't make it.. I do not want to even give one star* :@ :@ :@
customer_reviews.author: sindhuja uppalapati

customer_reviews.title: Came torn and broken!!!
customer_reviews.text: Was super excited to receive this but it came torn from the back and witha broken leg. So disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Muna rabbo

customer_reviews.title: Happy!
customer_reviews.text: The set up was so easy, great quality I can’t wait to decorate I’m very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Dewan Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice size for my bedroom. Cushions are stiff and become flat quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Toney Turner

customer_reviews.title: This couch is a doll house couch... ...
customer_reviews.text: This couch is a doll house couch... do not buy it unless you’re under 5ft... you get what you pay for though
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: After searching for a month for a new couch we decided to place a order after seeing this online, and we are so happy we did! The couch fits great in my one bed room apartment and looks amazing! Best purchase ever!
customer_reviews.author: martin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: I love this couch so far. Very easy to assemble. Color is on point. Delivery was painless, boxed so it got fit thru my door.
customer_reviews.author: mellymel817

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't recommend this couch. It is extremely uncomfortable, the arms of the chair are not padded at all, and there were several rips in the couch cushions. Beware!
customer_reviews.author: Julian Roberson

customer_reviews.title: Not sure I’d recommend this couch.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think it’ll last long. Doesn’t feel sturdy unless you sit Totally centered and don’t move. I would have returned it accept too close to holiday.
customer_reviews.author: leslie roy

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the price. When we were putting it together. These small beads came out of it and went all over our living room. I wish I could return it but I missed the date to do it. So now I'm stuck with it till I can get a new couch.
customer_reviews.author: asia

customer_reviews.title: Could be better.
customer_reviews.text: Could be better. Seat area could be wider so your butt fits.
customer_reviews.author: NA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small size living room
customer_reviews.text: Classy and comfortable. If you are looking for sectionals, don't think too much, pick the color and order it.
customer_reviews.author: Neel Basu

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: If you can't find the cushion it's inside the bottom. lol I love the couch!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Powers

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little couch for a small area/apartment etc. Holds up nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Homelegance Phelps 78" x 58" Fabric Reversible Chaise Sofa, Grayish Brown
product_meta.description: Style Name:Sofa Chaise| Color:Grayish BrownThis sectional sofa Group allows for maximum flexibility not only in style but placement as well. With a microfiber covering, refined track arm and comfortable seating, the collection’s style is compatible in a number of settings.
feature_bullets: Made of wood and upholstered in grayish brown fabric
Reversible seat and back cushion with tufting accent
Reversible chaise can be placed on either side of the sofa
Arm to Arm Length: 64.50"; Seat Depth: 23.25"; Seat Height: 18.5"H
Ships in 1 box and requires minor assembly; Weight capacity: 300 pounds

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars212 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
